text: Stanley Graham Stephens (September 16, 1929 - April 3, 2021) was an American politician and broadcaster. He served as the 20th Governor of Montana from 1989 until 1993. He was born in Calgary, Alberta. Stephens is a member of the Republican Party. Stephens died on April 3, 2021 in Kalispell, Montana at the age of 91. ==References== ==Other websites== *Montana Broadcasters Association *National Governors Association *Montana Historical Society *The Political Graveyard Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Governors of Montana Category:Politicians from Calgary Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Stan Stephens
